Verses: 1 thraatcharasam Pariyaasanseyyum, Madhubaanam Amalipannum; Adhinaal Mayangugira Oruvanum Gnaanavaanalla.
2 raajaavin Urukkudhal Singaththin Gerchchippukku Samaanam; Avanaik Kobappaduththugiravan Than Praananukke Dhroganseygiraan.
3 vazhakkukku Vilaguvadhu Manushanukku Menmai; Moodanaanavan Evanum Adhile Thalaiyittukkolvaan.
4 somberi Kulirugiradhendru Uzhamaattaan, Aruppile Pichchaikettaalum Avanukku Ondrunkidaiyaadhu.
5 manushanudaiya Irudhayaththilulla Yosanai Aazhamaana Thanneerpolirukkiradhu; Buththimaano Adhai Mondeduppaan.
6 manushar Perumbaalum Thangal Dhayaalaththaip Prasiththappaduththuvaargal; Unmaiyaana Manushanaik Kandupidippavan Yaar?
7 needhimaan Than Uththamaththile Nadakkiraan; Avanukkup Piragu Avan Pillaigalum Baakkiyavaangalaayiruppaargal.
8 niyaayaasanaththil Veetrirukkum Raajaa Than Kangalinaal Sagala Pollaappaiyum Sidharappannugiraan.
9 en Irudhayaththai Suththamaakkinen, En Paavamarath Thuppuravaanen Endru Sollaththakkavan Yaar?
10 vevveraana Niraikallum, Vevveraana Marakkaalum Aagiya Ivvirandum Karththarukku Aruvaruppaanavaigal.
11 pillaiyaanaalum, Adhin Seygai Suththamo Semmaiyo Enbadhu, Adhin Nadakkaiyinaal Vilangum.
12 ketkira Kaadhum, Kaangira Kannum Aagiya Ivvirandaiyum Karththar Undaakkinaar.
13 thookkaththai Virumbaadhe, Virumbinaal Thariththiranaavaai; Kan Vizhiththiru, Appozhudhu Aagaaraththinaal Thrupthiyaavaai.
14 kollugiravan: Nalladhalla, Nalladhalla Enbaan; Poivittapinbo Mechchikkolvaan.
15 ponnum Migudhiyaana Muththukkalum Undu; Arivulla Udhadugalo Vilaiyuyarndha Raththinam.
16 anniyanukkaagap Pinaippattavanudaiya Vasthiraththai Eduththukkol; Anniya Sthreeyinimiththam Avan Kaiyil Eedu Vaangikkol.
17 vanjanaiyinaal Vandha Pojanam Manushanukku Inbamaayirukkum; Pinbo Avanudaiya Vaai Parukkaik Karkalaal Nirappappadum.
18 aalosanaiyinaal Ennangal Sthirappadum; Nalyosanai Seydhu Yuththampannu.
19 thootrikkondu Thirigiravan Ragasiyangalai Velippaduththuvaan; Aadhalaal Than Udhadugalinaal Alappugiravanode Kalavaadhe.
20 than Thagappanaiyum Than Thaayaiyum Dhooshikkiravanudaiya Dheebam Kaarirulil Anaindhupom.
21 aarambaththile Thuridhamaagak Kidaiththa Sudhandharam Mudivile Aaseervaadham Peraadhu.
22 theemaikku Sarikkattuven Endru Sollaadhe; Karththarukkuk Kaaththiru, Avar Unnai Ratchippaar.
23 vevveraana Niraikarkal Karththarukku Aruvaruppaanavaigal; Kallaththaraasu Nalladhalla.
24 karththaraale Manusharudaiya Nadaigal Vaaikkum; Aagaiyaal Manushan Than Vazhiyai Arindhukolvadheppadi?
25 parisuththamaanadhai Vizhungugiradhum, Poruththanai Seydhapinbu Yosikkiradhum, Manushanukkuk Kanniyaayirukkum.
26 gnaanamulla Raajaa Dhunmaarkkarai Sidharadiththu, Avargalmel Urulaiyai Uruttuvaan.
27 manushanudaiya Aavi Karththar Thandha Dheebamaayirukkiradhu; Adhu Ullaththilullavaigalaiyellaam Aaraaindhupaarkkum.
28 dhayaiyum Saththiyamum Raajaavaik Kaakkum; Dhayaiyinaale Than Singaasanaththai Nirkappannuvaan.
29 vaalibarin Alangaaram Avargal Baraakkiramam; Mudhirvayadhaanavargalin Magimai Avargal Narai.
30 kaayaththin Thazhumbugalum, Ullaththil Uraikkum Adigalum, Pollaadhavanai Azhukkarath Thudaikkum.
